name: div
features: Weighted Base: 11 lbs for optimal stability; balanced between Tanner Original & Tanner Heavy
Base Material: Skid-resistant rubber-coated base with built-in handle for portability
Adjustability: One-hand adjustable stem for quick height changes
Top Feature: Patented hand-rolled Flextop for real contact feel
Durability: Reinforced steel stem designed for heavy daily use
Portability: Stem unscrews for compact storage & easy transport in a bat bag
Target Users: Ideal for pros, coaches, & beginners
Use Case: Built for both baseball & softball hitters
